resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
williamhyun opened a new pull request #12006:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12006


   This PR aims to bump ORC to 1.7.2 and use the official Apache distribution site.
   
   Apache ORC 1.7.2 is a maintenance release with the following bug fixes.
   
   - https://github.com/apache/orc/releases/tag/v1.7.2
   - https://orc.apache.org/news/2021/12/20/ORC-1.7.2/


--

ursabot commented on pull request #12006:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12006#issuecomment-999559668


   Benchmark runs are scheduled for baseline = 06fee4545535fc4a1af5c08b4e524ffb89bc7868 and contender = f904e39ad59bf75da1e74c2a45a9fdfae48d7d62. f904e39ad59bf75da1e74c2a45a9fdfae48d7d62 is a master commit associated with this PR. Results will be available as each benchmark for each run completes.
   Conbench compare runs links:
   [Scheduled] [ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/fb1afcca010a401dbfd03203070ec992...442b73401d324e43bb67183076424f7e/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-i9-9960x](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/d8df08da7b3c402a8b67d3da0f1cc178...b711e4eed22c4739943ced5bf7611942/)
   [Scheduled] [ursa-thinkcentre-m75q](https://conbench.ursa.dev/compare/runs/4a3ef2dac06046b7ae2b4d06586c1d8b...39f46a72af7147ec8700edeb7532852a/)
   Supported benchmarks:
   ec2-t3-xlarge-us-east-2: Supported benchmark langs: Python. Runs only benchmarks with cloud = True
   ursa-i9-9960x: Supported benchmark langs: Python, R, JavaScript
   ursa-thinkcentre-m75q: Supported benchmark langs: C++, Java
